location: EMIT Building, D-42, Sector 59, Noida, Uttar Pradesh 201301

roles.title: Software Developer
roles.description: Working as a core contributor on multiple large-scale, production-ready products, including an event management platform, a primary e-commerce website, and an internal dashboard portal. Responsible for owning end-to-end full-stack development with a strong emphasis on scalability, performance, reliability, and long-term maintainability.
achievements: Designed, developed, and deployed full-stack applications from scratch across multiple business-critical products
Implemented secure and scalable authentication and authorization systems
Optimized Docker images and CI/CD workflows to improve deployment efficiency and reduce infrastructure costs
Significantly improved application performance, SEO, and Core Web Vitals for user-facing platforms
Integrated LLM-powered features to streamline internal workflows and enhance product capabilities
Built complex, high-quality UI/UX features with a strong focus on accessibility and usability
Owned features end-to-end, from requirements gathering and technical design to production deployment

roles.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
roles.description: Completed a 4-month full-stack internship focused on building modern, performant, and scalable web applications using a contemporary JavaScript stack.
achievements: Developed full-stack applications using Next.js for frontend and Node.js for backend services
Integrated Sanity as a headless CMS to enable flexible and dynamic content management
Built fast, SEO-friendly static and hybrid websites using Astro
Collaborated with the team to design clean APIs and scalable application architecture

roles.title: ServiceNow Administration & Development Intern
roles.description: Gained foundational experience in ServiceNow administration and development, focusing on configuring, managing, and extending applications within the ServiceNow ecosystem.
achievements: Performed ServiceNow administration tasks including user, role, and instance configuration
Assisted in developing and customizing ServiceNow applications, workflows, and modules
Built a strong understanding of ServiceNow platform architecture and industry best practices
